ModMetaData.name: Build Productive!
ModMetaData.author: Micktu
ModMetaData.description: This convenient mod allows you to build by copying buildings you have already have, saving you a trip to the Architect tab. Simply select a building, click a button, and place. It also copies settings for buildings that have some. Currently it remembers electrical power switches, heater and cooler target temperature, turret hold-fire, and trap auto-rearm. Ask me for more if you need it! Some features planned, maybe. Some issues known, for sure. Happy building! P.S. Report bugs or get source code at github.com/micktu/RimWorld-BuildProductive
